Paper Folding 3D is an origami design software that allows users to create intricate and detailed paper models. This software has been developed by Zheyuan Su and is available for download on Windows and Mac operating systems. In this article, we will explore some of the key features of Paper Folding 3D and how it can be used to create beautiful paper models.

## Key Features

### 3D Preview

One of the most fascinating features of Paper Folding 3D is its 3D preview window. This feature allows users to visualize their designs in 3D, making it easier to understand the spatial relationships between different folds and creases. The 3D preview window also allows users to rotate their models and view them from different angles.

### User-friendly Interface

The user interface of Paper Folding 3D is simple and intuitive. The software features a toolbar with all the necessary tools and functions needed to create paper models. Users can easily access different features and tools from the toolbar, making the software very user-friendly.

### Export Options

Paper Folding 3D offers several export options, allowing users to save their projects as image files, PDFs, or 3D models. Users can choose from different image formats such as BMP, PNG, and JPEG. They can also export their designs as 3D models in OBJ or COLLADA formats.

### Library of Templates

Paper Folding 3D features a library of templates that users can choose from to create their paper models. These templates range from simple designs to complex models, allowing users to choose a template that suits their skill level. Users can also create their designs from scratch using the software's design tools.

## Conclusion

Paper Folding 3D is an excellent software for creating paper models and origami designs. Its user-friendly interface, 3D preview window, export options, and library of templates make it an ideal tool for both beginners and advanced users. With Paper Folding 3D, users can easily create intricate and beautiful paper models that are sure to impress.
